services.name: Bulking Program
services.description: A personalized bulking program designed to help you gain muscle mass and strength. Includes customized workout routines and nutritional guidance.

services.name: Cutting Program
services.description: An effective cutting program to help you lose body fat while preserving muscle. Includes tailored workout plans and dietary recommendations.

services.name: Strength Training Coaching
services.description: One-on-one coaching sessions focused on improving strength and power. Suitable for individuals of all fitness levels.

services.name: Meal Planning Service
services.description: Get a personalized meal plan tailored to your fitness goals and dietary preferences. Includes recipes and grocery lists.

services.name: Online Fitness Classes
services.description: Join live online fitness classes led by experienced instructors. Choose from a variety of workouts, including HIIT, yoga, and cardio.
